name: May I Take
description:
Welcome to beloved fast food organization Burger Cheese! It seems that the man ahead of you in line is reeeaaallllyyy taking his time to order...keep your cool by entering the characters on the screen, unless you want more than an order to be taken today.

A game by Andrew Kohler and Justin Foster (DoctorWhat#3284 and JohnSmithh#3661)

Sponsored by BURGER CHEESE CORP (TM)
